title: S.T.O.P. Surviving Time outside Prison
creator_credit: Pip Starr, Campbell Manderson and SKA TV
brief_description: Awareness-raising report on the plight of ex-prisoners of Deer Park correctional facility to secure adequate support for women who have been released from prison. Produced as a news story for SKA TV’s Access News, a grass-roots alternative to mainstream news and current affairs, broadcast weekly on Melbourne’s Community Television station Channel 31 since 1994.
creator_credit_for_label: Pip Starr, Campbell Manderson and SKA TV
